sourcesContent:
import { createReducer } from 'redux-from-void'
import { productInitialized } from '../actions'
import { OrganizationType, ProductType, ResponseProductDTO, TrustLevel } from '../dto/Product'


export interface ProductState extends Partial<ResponseProductDTO> {
    similarProducts: Partial<ResponseProductDTO>[] | undefined
}

const initialState : ProductState = {
    imageSrc: '',
    productName: '',
    productId: undefined,
    positionId: undefined,
    organizationName: '',
    organizationId: undefined,
    properties: [],
    isProtectedDeal: false,
    price: undefined,
    bookmarks: false,
    clientCount: undefined,
    trust: undefined,
    productDescription: '',
    organizationType: undefined,
    similarProducts: undefined
}

export default createReducer(initialState)(
    productInitialized.success,
    (_: any, { payload } : { payload: ResponseProductDTO }) => ({
        ...payload
    }),

    productInitialized,
    initialState
)
